thread.title: Four out of five Americans oppose sanctuary cities | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Four out of five Americans oppose sanctuary cities | Daily Mail Online

author: Francesca Chambers
title: Four out of five Americans oppose sanctuary cities | Daily Mail Online
text: show ad Four out of five Americans oppose sanctuary cities that shield illegal immigrants - just like Donald Trump A poll conducted by Harvard-Harris and found that 80 percent of Americans believe local law enforcement should turn over illegal immigrants they arrest Survey indicates widespread support for President Donald Trump's directive to federal agencies to cut off funding for sanctuary cities across America Many large cities say they are not sanctuary cities even though they protect illegal immigrants - Trump's order says Homeland Security gets to decide Poll came out as Trump's administration laid the groundwork for more illegal residents to be deported Published: 15:15 GMT, 22 February 2017 | Updated: 15:23 GMT, 22 February 2017 22 shares
